description.value:
Replacement Power: When casting a Rites domain spell with a costly material component—or casting permanency on any domain spell—reduce the cost of the necessary components by 20%.

Replacement Domain Spells:

  • 1st—@Compendium[pf1.spells.5o8uysrb153tnvci]{Sanctify Corpse}
  • 5th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.nsxngq65mbrzgwnm]{Permanency}
  • 8th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.gb7pxobi1za67p7g]{Binding}
